ValidationRule.description: LAMBDA-19837. To generate final quote, Opportunity Owner role has to be one of the following roles: System Administrator, ISR, ISR Renewals, ISR New Business, CSM, Manager CSM, Manager New Sales, Manager Renewals, ISR External.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT($Setup.Quality_Bars_Configuration__c.Disabled_Opportunity_QBs__c) && TEXT(StageName) = 'Final Quote' && !( OR( Owner.UserRole.Name = 'System Administrator', Owner.UserRole.Name = 'ISR Renewals', Owner.UserRole.Name = 'ISR', Owner.UserRole.Name = 'ISR New Business', Owner.UserRole.Name = 'CSM', Owner.UserRole.Name = 'Manager CSM', Owner.UserRole.Name = 'Manager New Sales', Owner.UserRole.Name = 'Manager Renewals', Owner.UserRole.Name = 'ISR External'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To generate final quote, Opportunity Owner role has to be one of the following roles: System Administrator, ISR, ISR Renewals, ISR New Business, CSM, Manager CSM, Manager New Sales, Manager Renewals, ISR External.
